sentences.cn: 金兹伯格则发表了一篇指导性质的更简明的述评.

sentences.en: After the tutorial presents the realization of this mechanism.
sentences.cn: 之后本文给出了这种机制的具体实现.

sentences.en: For step - by - step instructions to build this application, see the Tutorial.
sentences.cn: 客户化应用程序显示.阅读教程, 了解如何一步一步地创建这个应用.

sentences.en: He also told me that your attendances at his tutorial and seminar have been poor .
sentences.cn: 他还告诉我说你的辅导课和讨论课出勤率不高。

sentences.en: Hung - chien said with a laugh, " How can there be an expert on the tutorial system?
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 笑道: “ 导师制有什么专家!

sentences.en: I am sorry to be late for our tutorial. Someone stopped to talk to me downstairs.
sentences.cn: 真是抱歉,去辅导课我迟到了.有人在楼下叫住我谈了一会儿.

sentences.en: Is that supposed to be part of the Oxford - Cambridge tutorial system? "
sentences.cn: 这算牛津剑桥的导师制 么 ? ”

sentences.en: Students may decide to seek tutorial guidance.
sentences.cn: 学生可以决定寻求导师指导。

sentences.en: The Normal Distribution Tutorial: A tutorial on the Normal or Gaussian distribution.
sentences.cn: 常态分布讲解: 常态或高斯分布的讲解.

sentences.en: The tutorial features objects that, when hovered on, rises upwards.
sentences.cn: 本教程的特点, 当对象上徘徊, 上升向上.

sentences.en: This tutorial has taught you how to access and manipulate XML documents.
sentences.cn: 这份教程已经教会你如何访问和操作XML文件了.
他们的导师制(Tutorialsystem)是怎么一会事? ”

sentences.en: When shall we have a tutorial?
sentences.cn: 我们什么时候能有一节辅导课?

sentences.en: Why doesn't Ann give her tutorial on time?
sentences.cn: 为什么安不能准时去上辅导课?

words.tran_cn: 当家庭教师；（美）在家庭教师指导下学习

phrases.tran_cn: n. 个别辅导制；大学导师制

trans.tran_cn: 导师的，私人教师的，辅导的
trans.tran_en: relating to a tutor or their work

trans.tran_cn: 个别辅导时间，教程，辅导材料，使用说明书，辅导课
trans.tran_en: a period of teaching and discussion with a tutor, especially in a British university
